mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboards ( title, content, writer, club_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{clubId} )
mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.title, f.content, f.writer, f.created_at AS createdAt, f.view_count AS viewCount, u.nickname AS writerNickname, u.username AS writerUsername FROM freeboards f JOIN users u ON f.writer = u.id ORDER BY f.created_at DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT f.id, f.title, f.content, f.writer, f.created_at AS createdAt, f.view_count AS viewCount, f.club_id AS clubId, c.club_name AS clubName, u.nickname AS writerNickname, u.username AS writerUsername, (SELECT MAX(t1.id) FROM freeboards t1 WHERE t1.id < f.id) AS prev, (SELECT MIN(t2.id) FROM freeboards t2 WHERE t2.id > f.id) AS next FROM freeboards f JOIN users u ON f.writer = u.id JOIN clubs c ON f.club_id = c.id WHERE f.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.freeboard, c.parent, c.writer, c.content, c.created_at AS createdAt, u.username AS writerUsername, u.nickname AS nickname FROM freeboard_comments c JOIN users u ON c.writer = u.id WHERE c.freeboard = #{freeboardId} ORDER BY c.parent ASC, c.created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE freeboards SET club_id = #{clubId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
